2.0.x-dev.name: mouf/utils.common.getvars
2.0.x-dev.description: This is a legacy non-OO package and should not be used in recent developments. A simple package that provides functions to get the parameters from the request in a consistent way. The varaiables can be rerieved in a way that is independent of the php.ini configuration file. Especially, it can cancel the effect of the dreadful 'magic_quotes' parameter.

v2.0.0.name: mouf/utils.common.getvars
v2.0.0.description: This is a legacy non-OO package and should not be used in recent developments. A simple package that provides functions to get the parameters from the request in a consistent way. The varaiables can be rerieved in a way that is independent of the php.ini configuration file. Especially, it can cancel the effect of the dreadful 'magic_quotes' parameter.
